name: 300 Visitor Badges Stickers Visitor Log Book with Carbon Copy Visitor Pass Stickers with Carbonless Visitor Name Tags Guest Registry Log Book for School Business Church (1)
short_description: 【Package Includes】You will receive a visitor log book with 300 stickers, making visitor badges with registry log easy to record visitor information even in the busiest places.The size of the visitor guest book is 7.4*10.98 inches. Each visitor sticker is 1.88 x 3.07 inches with enough space to write down the visitor's information.

【Automatic Rewriting Technology】 Notice: For best copying performance, please use a ballpoint pen when writing. Each visitor sticker uses carbonless copy paper technology, automatically creating a copy as you write. This means that when you hand a visitor badge to a guest, a duplicate of the badge information (such as name, destination, date, and time in) is permanently stored in the logbook, ensuring accurate records for easy tracking and archiving.

【Spiral Binding And Thoughtful Design】This visitor log book for business features durable spiral square hole coil binding that lays flat, making every page easy to write on.The specially designed extended back cover can be placed under the written page to effectively prevent copy marks from transferring to the next page, maintaining a neat and professional appearance.

【Easy Labeling And Removal】Each visitor stickers adheres securely to clothing and leaves no residue or damage after removal. During visitor registration, simply peel off the visitor badges and apply visitor registration sign to clothing to clearly identify visitors, significantly improving check-in and management efficiency at schools, businesses, or events.

【Wide Range Of Applications】This bright yellow sign in book for business is highly visible and easy to find. visitor guest book with stickers is suitable for a wide range of environments requiring visitor management, such as schools, offices, factories, hospitals, and business conferences. visitor badges with registry log serves as both an efficient visitor identification system and a reliable legal record-keeping tool, enhancing your business's professional image.
